string.text: Hello!
Greetings!
Where's the money for the task?
Find my assistant, and there will be for you money!
It is good, but this time without deceit!
Who are you?
Leha the Jaw they call me! And these tramps - my brigade!
What are you and your people doing here?
Me and my children will take a rest here! Afterwards, we will go to Pripyat.
What do you know about Pripyat?
I know that it is an old abandoned city from the epoch of communism!\nNow it is just crowded with monsters and Monolithians. Those who have gone before me did not return, none.\n
Don't you think it is very dangerous to go there, then?
No doubts about that, you are right. But I am sure it is worth trying.
Did you see military nearby?
No, fortunatelly not. It has been quite a while since they showed up the last time here.
Not even military Stalkers?

I heard some of them appeared in the radar region, near the antennas! As they were disconnected, many people started traveling to the Radar and further to Pripyat! But we did not meet any further people coming from the wharehouses since we came here. Likely, someone has blocked the road here.
Blocked, you say? By whom, what do you think? The military?

As I said, the military didn't show up for a long time; hence, it could've been the military stalkers. Those are tough bastards, and they operate really quickly and harmoniously. I wonder they did not block the road earlier!
Wouldn't it be more clever to go Pripyat and block the entrance there?
I do not know, maybe they fear proceeding, or they are preparing for something. It is useless to guess what's on their mind.
Well, anyway... do you have a task for me?
Well, there is one, but it is not easy... Still interested, Stalker?
Yes, I'm not afraid of hard work!
Not easy, hmm... Well, no, you'll have to find someone else.
I understand... I am afraid myself, I prefer to spend money and send someone instead of myself or my people. What a pity.

Well, alright!
So, here is your task: My scouts, Loma and Log, have been sent to Pripyat to check how bad the situation really is, but they did not return yet.
 Try to find them alive and bring them back safely... If this is not possible, at least bring their guns back, they were good ones, and we need them here!
I will give you 2000 if you complete this task for me!
Seems fair to me, I'll bring your men back.
2000? You got to be kidding me. This task must be worth 4000.
I'm sorry, Stalker. 2000 is all I can offer.
Excellent, I'll wait here for you!
Marked One reporting... Task is executed!
Perfect! Give me his PDA!
Hold on, mate. First show the money!
Stupid scum. I guess he has nothing!
Please, stop kidding me. You don't want to challenge me, do you?
I'd rather just kill you off!
Alright I understand. Good luck, then...
I can give nothing to you, money is not present. If you want, you can have his stuff!
Nevermind... It's for free, then. I'm not interested in his stuff.
I did not found it yet.
Well, better hurry up if you want to get your money, Stalker.
I have found your men, but they were dead already. I can't tell what killed them, I had to draw them out of a chimera's claws. Their weapons seem to be intact, here they are.

Oh, shit. Those were my best men... Now where they are all gone, I think there is no sense in going to Pripyat... I don't want to lead my men into a suicide mission! One problem remains, I cannot give you money for the task. My assistant ran away with it all the money... Please understand, Marked One.
I will find him! Tell me where to search. And don't try to cheat on me. You'd be a dead man in, like, 5 seconds.
I think he did not get far I will note it on the map, here or here! If you find him, return him here. If he "accidently" died, his PDA would be enough... Got it?
Well, wait for me! I will bring your PDA.
I have not found them.
Find them faster! I cannot wait here eternally!!! Good luck!
